scone.os



enum int TIOCGWINSZ;
needs to be specifically set, otherwise ioctl crashes D:

struct OS;
Wrapper for OS specific functions

package(scone) static auto init();
Initializes console/terminal to best settings when using scone

package(scone) static auto deinit();
De-initializes console/terminal

static auto size();
Get the size of the window

Returns:
uint[2], where [0] is width, and [1] is height

static void resize(uint width, uint height);
Set the size of the window

static @property auto cursorVisible(bool visible);
Set if the cursor should be visible

static auto setCursor(uint x, uint y);
Set the cursor at position

Note:
This function should only be called by scone itself

static @property void title(string title);
Set the title of the window
